nl.esciencecenter.octopus.adaptors.local

Class LocalFileAttributes

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.esciencecenter.octopus.adaptors.local.LocalFileAttributes
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FileAttributes

    public class LocalFileAttributes
extends Object
implements FileAttributes
    LocalFileAttributes implements a FileAttributes for local files.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Jason Maassen
